name: Nodemailer SMTP 最小
description: SMTP サーバーに接続してメール送信（開発用）。

files.template:
const nodemailer = require('nodemailer');
(async () => { const transport = nodemailer.createTransport({ host: '{{host}}', port: Number('{{port}}'), secure: false }); const info = await transport.sendMail({ from: 'no-reply@example.com', to: 'user@example.com', subject: 'Hello', text: 'Hello SMTP' }); console.log(info.messageId); })();
